key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Show toolbar. A standard option for toolbars.

key.name: theme
key.description: Robot image theme. The theme of the images to use for the robots.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Background color. The hex specification of the background color.

key.name: configuration
key.description: Game type. The name of the game variation to use.

key.name: use-safe-moves
key.description: Use safe moves. The safe moves option will help you to avoid being killed due to a mistake. If you try to make a move that would lead to your death when there is a safe move available you will not be allowed to proceed.

key.name: use-super-safe-moves
key.description: Use super safe moves. The player is alerted when there is no safe move and the only option is to teleport out.

key.name: enable-sound
key.description: Enable game sounds. Play sounds for various events throughout the game.
